item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "What's so unpleasant about being drunk?" "Ask a glass of water!" -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Sir,' I said to the universe, 'I exist.' 'That,' said the universe, 'creates no sense of obligation in me whatsoever." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut, Jr
item.description: "Dear future generations: Please accept our apologies. We were rolling drunk on petroleum." -- Kurt Vonnegut, Jr

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Laughter and tears are both responses to frustration and exhaustion. I myself prefer to laugh, since there is less cleaning do to do afterward." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "How nice -- to feel nothing, and still get full credit for being alive." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "1492. As children we were taught to memorize this year with pride and joy as the year people began living full and imaginative lives on the continent of North America. Actually, people had been living full and imaginative lives on the continent of North America for hundreds of years before that. 1492 was simply the year sea pirates began to rob, cheat, and kill them." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Being a Humanist means trying to behave decently without expectation of rewards or punishment after you are dead." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I am a humanist, which means, in part, that I have tried to behave decently without expectations of rewards or punishments after I am dead." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "You never know what worse luck your bad luck has saved you from." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Annie Lamott
item.description: "No" is a complete sentence." -- Annie Lamott

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Forgiveness is giving up all hope of having had a better past." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Norton Juster
item.description: "Expect everything, I always say, and the unexpected never happens." -- Norton Juster

item.title: Lizzy add a quote by Peter Matthiessen
item.description: "We have outsmarted ourselves, like greedy monkeys, and now we are full of dread." -- Peter Matthiessen
